rows.label: bf06120140_0010
rows.name:
To be precise, it is one of the [System:Ruby rt=Devices ]Servants[/System:Ruby] 
that the [System:Ruby rt=Hikari ]Heaven's Holy Grail[/System:Ruby] uses.

rows.label: bf06120140_0030
rows.name: If it's Hikari's [System:Ruby rt=Device ]Servant[/System:Ruby], why were we attacked?

rows.label: bf06120140_0050
rows.name:
Serpent sank into the Cloud Sea during 
the battle with Metsu 500 years ago.
